globalProperty.value: SELECT pe.person_id AS 'person_id' ,pe.uuid AS 'patient_uuid' ,pss.patient_state AS 'patient_state' ,pss.patient_status AS 'patient_status' , DATE_FORMAT(pss.date_created, "%Y-%m-%d") AS 'date_created' FROM person pe INNER JOIN patient pt ON pt.patient_id = pe.person_id INNER JOIN patient_status_state pss ON pss.patient_id = pt.patient_id WHERE pe.uuid = ${patientUuid} ORDER BY pss.date_created DESC;
